title: RAVA – AI Anomaly Detection
description: AI platform for real-time LTE KPI anomaly detection and intelligent alerting in telecom networks.
problem: Manual monitoring of telecom KPIs is inefficient and fails to detect complex, multivariate anomalies at scale.
solution: Designed and trained unsupervised deep learning models (CAE, LSTM-AE, Transformer AE) to detect anomalies in hourly LTE KPIs, with per-band modeling and incremental training.
outcome: Improved anomaly visibility and root-cause analysis for LTE radio cells, enabling proactive network monitoring.

title: Hate Speech Detection System
description: Machine learning system for detecting hate speech in textual data.
problem: Manual moderation of harmful content is time-consuming and inconsistent.
solution: Built a text classification pipeline using NLP preprocessing and supervised learning models to identify hate speech.
outcome: Achieved reliable automated classification suitable for moderation support systems.

title: QuickLab – Smart Medical Laboratory System
description: AI-assisted medical laboratory management platform with OCR and disease prediction.
problem: Medical labs suffer from inefficient patient registration and fragmented data management.
solution: Developed a platform combining OCR-based patient registration and ML-driven disease prediction with a user-friendly interface.
outcome: Streamlined lab workflows and improved data accessibility for healthcare staff.

title: Assurini – Digital Insurance Platform
description: Web platform modernizing insurance services with online subscriptions and remote assessments.
problem: Traditional insurance processes are slow, paper-based, and inconvenient for users.
solution: Designed an end-to-end digital insurance platform enabling online vehicle insurance, damage assessment, and premium payments.
outcome: Provided a scalable foundation for transparent, user-centric insurance management.

title: Walmart Store Sales Forecasting
description: Time series forecasting project for retail sales prediction.
problem: Retail businesses struggle to accurately predict sales across multiple stores and seasons.
solution: Applied statistical analysis and machine learning models to forecast weekly store sales.
outcome: Improved understanding of demand patterns and seasonality effects in large-scale retail data.

title: University E-Learning Platform
description: Role-based academic e-learning platform for students, instructors, and administrators.
problem: Universities need centralized systems to manage courses, users, and learning resources.
solution: Built a full-stack e-learning platform with role-based access and modular content management.
outcome: Enabled structured online learning and simplified academic resource distribution.

title: SecureAuth – Biometric Authentication App
description: Desktop biometric authentication application using multiple biometric modalities.
problem: Single-factor authentication systems are vulnerable and insecure.
solution: Implemented a Kivy-based application combining facial recognition, voice recognition, and biometric identification.
outcome: Demonstrated multi-factor biometric authentication in a standalone desktop application.
